author: Saurabh Mishra
title: Application Modernization Agility on Google Cloud
description: Application modernization is the process of refactoring an organizationâ€™s legacy apps to a cloud-native approach. It is process of taking existing organization on-premises apps to modernize may involve migrating those apps to a various cloud type i.e., private, public, hybrid in other words migrating from Monolithic to Microservices architecture.
